name: Liwertown: Rebirth
description:
It's the middle of the night and a zombie pandemic just broke in this dark 2D platformer world. Explore the town, Fight zombies, Find the last survivors, and Discover who is behind the mysterious factory explosion that caused it all, all while following the story from 2 different points of view.

Town full of bloodthirsty zombies:
No time to think - you have to FIGHT, It's life or death and you are the one to decide which is the future.


Follow the hidden mystery:
A zombie pandemic is not something ordinary, something has to be wrong. you'll have to uncover the truth behind the whole problem.


Explore the small isolated city:
Liwertown is small and unheard of, it needs a hero who will take the risk and explore the city under the current circumstances.


Find the last survivors and discuss the situation with them:
EVERYONE is in a panic, and EVERYONE wants to stay alive, so you all have to decide the best action plan for you and the other survivors.



Features


  • Follow an engaging story mystery
  • Kill bloodthirsty zombies
  • Collect different weapons
  • Play as people who have two sides of the same story
  • Talk with the survivors that you find
